Name: architecture
Description: Can either be CPU or GPU

Name: nts
Description: Number of Time Steps (minutes) model and spinup

Name: spinup
Description: Number of time steps of the spinup

Name: model_dt
Description: Number of minutes between time steps

Name: n_iter
Description: Number of model iterations to run

Name: output_size_bins
Description: Number of size bins for species' outputs (only applies to arrays).

Name: num_foraging_attempts
Description: Number of foraging attempts to cycle through. Includes tradeoff between realism and performance

Name: plt_diags
Description: 0 = Do not plot diagnostics : 1 = plot diagnostics
